name: yaga

scripts.test: npm run tsc; mocha; karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.tsc: tsc --out test/yaga-tests.js ts/**/*.spec.ts; tsc --out browser-test/yaga-tests.js ts/**/*.spec.ts ts/drivers/**/**/*.browser-spec.ts
scripts.dist: tsc --out dist/complete.js ts/drivers/**/index.ts; tsc --out dist/leaflet.js ts/drivers/leaflet-driver/index.ts; tsc --out dist/angular.js ts/drivers/angular-driver/index.ts; tsc --out dist/leaflet-ng.js ts/drivers/leaflet-ng-driver/index.ts;

author: Arne Schubert <atd.schubert@gmail.com>, Stephan Herritsch <steveherritsch@hotmail.com>, Markus Strau√ü <msstrauss@gmx.de>
